packagegui.title: Services: Avahi
packagegui.name: avahi

field.description:
Enter the (comma separated) list of domains that you would like proxied. (Example: local, pfsense.org, mydomain.com)
(Default: local)

Interfaces that you do NOT want Avahi to listen on.
Note: WAN is always disabled (so it is not shown here).
Enable IPv4 support in Avahi. (Default: enabled)
Enable IPv6 support in Avahi. (Default: enabled)
Disable D-Bus client API support in Avahi. (Default: no)
The size of the object cache. Leave blank for default, 0 to disable. Disabling the cache can help with object duplication when reflecting.
Enable wide-area DNS-SD, aka DNS-SD over unicast DNS. (Default: enabled)
field.sethelp:
If this is enabled only domains ending in .local will be resolved on mDNS, all other domains are resolved via unicast DNS.
If you want to maintain multiple different multicast DNS domains even with this option enabled, use subdomains of .local, such as "kitchen.local".

field.description: Disable publishing of services and address records. (Default: no)
field.sethelp:
If checked, records will not be published by Avahi, not even address records for the local host. Avahi will be started in a querying-only mode. This can be used as a security measure.
Warning: Do NOT disable publishing unless absolutely required!

field.description: Disable publishing for user services (Default: no)
field.sethelp: If checked, Avahi will still publish records but will not allow user applications to publish services. This can be used as a security measure.

field.description: Add an implicit TXT entry to all locally registered services. (Default: disabled)
field.sethelp: This can be used to detect if two services on two different interfaces/protocols are actually identical.

field.description: Register mDNS address records for all local IP addresses (Default: enabled)
field.sethelp: If enabled, Avahi will register mDNS address records for all local IP addresses. Unless Avahi will be used exclusively for browsing, enable this option. This option must be enabled to register local services.

field.description: Register an mDNS HINFO record on all interfaces with local info. (Default: enabled)
field.sethelp:
If enabled, Avahi will register an mDNS HINFO record on all interfaces containing information about the local operating system and CPU.
This is recommended by the mDNS specification but not required. This feature may be disabled for security and privacy reasons.

field.description: Register a service of type "_workstation._tcp" on the local LAN. (Default: enabled)
field.sethelp: This is useful for administrative purposes, such as browsing for all PCs on the LAN.

field.description: Publish the system unicast DNS servers (Default: disabled)
field.sethelp:
Publish the unicast DNS servers configured in System > General Setup to announce them using mDNS
When used in conjunction with avahi-dnsconfd on the client side this allows DHCP-like configuration of unicast DNS servers.

field.description: Publish IPv6 AAAA record via IPv4 (Default: enabled)
field.sethelp: If enabled, Avahi will publish an IPv6 AAAA record via IPv4, allowing the local IPv6 addresses to be resolved using IPv4.

field.description: Publish IPv4 A record via IPv6 (Default: disabled)
field.sethelp: If enabled, Avahi will publish an IPv4 A record via IPv6, allowing the local IPv4 addresses to be resolved using IPv6.

field.description: Reflect incoming mDNS requests to all local network interfaces (Default: enabled)
field.sethelp: If enabled, Avahi will reflect incoming mDNS requests to all local network interfaces, effectively allowing clients to browse mDNS/DNS-SD services on all networks connected to the gateway.

field.description: Forward mDNS traffic between IPv4 and IPv6 (Default: disabled)
field.sethelp: If enabled, Avahi will forward mDNS traffic between IPv4 and IPv6, which is usually not recommended.
